description: Returns a summary of resource evaluation for the specified resource evaluation ID from the proactive rules that were run. The results indicate which evaluation context was used to evaluate the rules, which resource details were evaluated, the evaluation mode that was run, and whether the resource details comply with the configuration of the proactive rules.

parameters.name: ResourceEvaluationId
parameters.description: The unique ResourceEvaluationId of Amazon Web Services resource execution for which you want to retrieve the evaluation summary.

nested_items.name: ResourceEvaluationId
nested_items.description: The unique ResourceEvaluationId of Amazon Web Services resource execution for which you want to retrieve the evaluation summary.

nested_items.name: EvaluationMode
nested_items.description: Lists results of the mode that you requested to retrieve the resource evaluation summary. The valid values are Detective or Proactive.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of an execution. The valid values are In_Progress, Succeeded or Failed.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: An explanation for failed execution status.

nested_items.name: EvaluationStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The start timestamp when Config rule starts evaluating compliance for the provided resource details.

nested_items.name: Compliance
nested_items.description: The compliance status of the resource evaluation summary.

nested_items.name: EvaluationContextIdentifier
nested_items.description: A unique EvaluationContextIdentifier ID for an EvaluationContext.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: A unique resource ID for an evaluation.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource being evaluated.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfiguration
nested_items.description: The resource definition to be evaluated as per the resource configuration schema type.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfigurationSchemaType
nested_items.description: The schema type of the resource configuration.
